quake 1 has aged remarkably well its frenetic and precise combat feels better than many contemporary boomer shooters its more similar to doom eternal than it is to most of its peers every weapon is useful weapon swapping is immediate and essential to high level play some of the levels are a bit too mazey for my taste but even those were more bearable than i was expecting
